quoteText: In addition to cookies, we may also use other similar tracking technologies on our services.
title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr: The Cookie Policy states that they use Web Beacons (also called "tracking pixels", "internet tags", "pixel tags" or "clear gifs"), Embedded Scripts, Device Fingerprinting, and Local Storage.
